name: Clash of the Clodhoppers
description:
Description:

Cut, shoot, slingshot, crabwalk and minecart your way through maze-like arenas and grab the most moonshine before your bearded buddies do. Take your trailer and boomstick all around the world and cause a ruckus in this Bomberman inspired capture the flag game.

Features:

  • 8 arenas with unique mechanics
  • 4 versus and co-op game modes
  • Up to 4 local players
  • Smort and not so smort bots
  • Keyboard and controller support
  • A pirate ship with cannons that shoot sea urchins

Challenge your friends in the Clash of the Clodhoppers!
